comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I don't think it's he, but I wonder if this was supposed to be the famous Plenty Coups? See: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plenty_Coups

comment.author: 61498590@N03
comment._content: I believe this may be the same person. A review of newspapers and other sources from the period (early 20th century) suggests that his name was regularly printed as "Plenty Coos." Thanks for visiting.
